title: Is Mylan CEO Heather Bresch the Daughter of W.V. Democratic Senator Joe Manchin?
subtitle: A meme about Manchin's vote to confirm Kavanaugh accurately notes that Heather Bresch is Manchin's daughter, but it's not clear why that's relevant.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Heather Bresch is the daughter of West Virgnia Democrat Joe Manchin.
